description: Try our easy to follow Turkey with Fig, Orange & Walnut Stuffing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Turkey with Fig, Orange & Walnut Stuffing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat butter and oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add onion and bacon. Cook for 8 minutes or until onion is soft. Stir in garlic and figs. Cook for 2 minutes. Remove from heat and cool.

Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Line a large baking pan with baking paper. Transfer the onion mixture to a bowl. Add the breadcrumbs, orange rind, 1/3 cup of the orange juice, eggs, walnut, port and thyme. Mix well to combine.

Fill front cavities of turkey with stuffing. Tie legs together with kitchen twine and tuck wings under. Place into pan. Brush with oil. Cook for 3 hours and 30 minutes or until cooked to your liking. To test, insert a skewer into the thickest part of thigh. If juices are pink, continue cooking until juices are clear. Transfer to a platter. Stand for 10 minutes. Serve.
